description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the secure boot security feature bypass vulnerability (CVE-2024-37989):

1. Download and install the relevant KB updates based on your operating system build from the Microsoft Update Catalog.

2. Restart your system after installation to ensure the changes take effect.

**Details**:
- The updates for Windows 11 and Windows 10 can be applied through the following links:
  - [KB5040442](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040442)
  - [KB5040431](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040431)
  - [KB5040448](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040448)
  - [KB5040427](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040427)
- This vulnerability involves improper handling of length parameter inconsistencies that could allow bypassing secure boot features.

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure the system is on a supported build that is affected by this vulnerability.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
